item.title: [Major] Issues with Logins
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Login Service Outage Summary: Users are experiencing errors and timeouts when attempting to log in to Box. Our team is actively investigating the issue and working to restore full functionality. We will provide updates as they become available.

Mar 7, 13:57 PST
Monitoring - Our team has taken steps to remediate this issue and the login service should be returning to full functionality. We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact.

Mar 7, 13:36 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Mar 7, 13:36 PST
Investigating - Our team is investigating an issue with Logins within Box. Users attempting to log in to Box may see errors or timeouts. We will provide additional information as it becomes available

item.title: [Major] Customers may experience issues with Logins, Uploads, and Box Sign
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Service Disruption: Logins, Uploads, and Box Sign

Our team is currently investigating an issue affecting the login, upload, and Box Sign services. Users may experience errors or timeouts while attempting to use these services. We are actively working to resolve this issue and will provide updates as they become available.

Mar 1, 14:05 PST
Investigating - Our team is investigating an issue with Logins, Uploads, and Box Sign. Users attempting to use these services may see errors or timeouts. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

item.title: [Minor] Item Counts Not Updating
item.content:encoded:
监控，解决，文件和文件夹计数，Box服务，更新

Box服务在2月19日出现了文件和文件夹计数不更新的问题，经过调查后发现这只影响了外观计数字段，不影响使用和访问任何Box功能或服务。他们的团队已经采取措施来解决这个问题，并且正在看到文件和文件夹计数的改善。尽管客户应该会逐渐看到改善，但需要一些时间才能使所有计数都是最新的。在进一步监测后，他们认为这个问题现在已经解决了，并恢复了Box服务的全部功能。如果您继续遇到任何问题，请联系Box支持团队。

Feb 19, 18:24 PST
Resolved - After further monitoring, this incident is now considered resolved. Box services have been restored to full functionality. Please contact Box Support at https://support.box.com/ if you continue to experience any issues.

Feb 19, 11:09 PST
Update - Our team is continuing to monitor the progress of File and Folder counts. While customers should continue to see gradual improvement, it will take some time for all counts to be up to date. We will provide another update once the issue is considered fully resolved or if the status of the issue changes.

Feb 19, 10:44 PST
Monitoring - Our team has taken steps to remediate this issue and is seeing improvement in file and folder counts. Customers should begin to see gradual improvement with counts updating across Box. We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact and to ensure the issue will be fully resolved by the steps we have taken.

Feb 19, 09:59 PST
Investigating - Our team is investigating an issue with File and Folder counts not updating. This issue only affects the aesthetic count fields. It does not affect the ability to use or access any Box features or services. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

item.title: [Major] Issues with Logins
item.content:encoded:
登录问题，解决，监控，识别，调查

总结: 2月14日，Box登录出现问题，经过团队调查和监控后，确定了问题的根源并采取了解决措施。他们已经恢复了登录功能，并表示如有其他问题可以联系支持部门。

Feb 14, 12:36 PST
Resolved - After further monitoring, this incident is now considered resolved. All logins have has been restored to full functionality. If you continue to experience any issues, please contact Box Support at https://support.box.com.

Feb 14, 12:23 PST
Monitoring - Our team has taken steps to remediate this issue and the login service should be returning to full functionality. We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact.

Feb 14, 11:53 PST
Identified - Our team has identified the underlying cause of this issue and is working to take remediating steps. We will provide additional updates as they become available.

Feb 14, 11:22 PST
Investigating - Our team is investigating an issue with Logins within Box. Users attempting to log in to Box may see errors or timeouts. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

item.title: [Minor] Issue with Uploads, Downloads and Public API
item.content:encoded:
Jan 22, 16:16 PST
Resolved - From approximately 3:37 PM to 3:47 PM US Pacific time, we had an issue impacting uploads, downloads and Public API. Our systems automatically detected and corrected the underlying issue. There is no current impact and no further updates will be provided here. If you are currently seeing any issues, please let us know at https://support.box.com.

item.title: [Outage] Issues with Logins, Uploads, Downloads, API calls
item.content:encoded:
Dec 15, 17:08 PST
Resolved - Box's FTP Server has been restored to full functionality. All Box Services are now operating as expected, therefore, this incident is considered resolved. If you continue to experience any issues, please contact Box Support at https://support.box.com.

Dec 15, 15:08 PST
Update - We are continuing to see errors subside for users connecting to Box's FTP Server. We are still actively monitoring for additional impact as services return back to full functionality.

Dec 15, 14:00 PST
Update - After further monitoring, our teams identified some impact for users attempting to connect to Box's FTP Server which were resulting in errors or failed logins. Our teams have taken steps to swiftly remediate these errors and we are already seeing improvement. We are continuing to monitor for additional impact as services return back to full functionality.

Dec 15, 13:12 PST
Update - All Box Services should now be restored. We are still continuing to monitor for any additional impact.

Dec 15, 12:06 PST
Update - All Box Services should now be restored. We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact.

Dec 15, 11:02 PST
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact.

Dec 15, 10:25 PST
Update - Box Services continue to show rapid improvement, but users may experience some latency as services continue to restore back to full functionality. We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact.

Dec 15, 09:48 PST
Monitoring - Our team has taken steps to remediate this issue and seeing improvement across all Box Services. We are continuing to monitor for any additional impact as services return back to full functionality.

Dec 15, 09:27 PST
Identified - We have identified the underlying cause of this issue and our teams continue to work towards a full restoration of services as soon as possible. We will provide additional updates as they become available.

Dec 15, 09:07 PST
Update - Service restoration efforts are still ongoing. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

Dec 15, 08:36 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue. Box services remain completely inaccessible, but our teams are actively working to get services restored as soon as possible. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

Dec 15, 07:31 PST
Update - Our team is continuing to investigate and have confirmed this issue is impacting all Box Services. Users attempting to use Box may see errors, timeouts, but for the most part services will be completely inaccessible. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

Dec 15, 07:14 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Dec 15, 06:38 PST
Investigating - Our team is investigating an issue with Logins, Uploads, Downloads, All Files page, API calls. Users attempting to use these services may see errors or timeouts. We will provide additional information as it becomes available.

item.title: Enhanced Email Deliverability from Status.box.com
item.content:encoded:
Oct 12, 14:45 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 12, 14:31 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 12, 14:24 PDT
Scheduled - To enhance our email deliverability, we are changing the FROM address on status.box.com email notifications to noreply@box.com instead of noreply@statuspage.io. Customers may want to review and adjust any email filters or policies in place for these email notifications.

item.title: [Major] Issues with Search Functionality
item.content:encoded:
Oct 10, 19:07 PDT
Resolved - Teams have isolated the cause of the search issues and have completed steps to remediate further impact. A reindexing job was kicked off and will complete in the next 24 hours in which any remaining missing files will be processed. Please contact Box Support at https://support.box.com/ if you continue to experience any issues.

Oct 10, 17:54 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue. As of now, impact is not seen to be widespread. Teams are working to further identify the level of impact and have implemented jobs to assist with discoverability. Further updates will be posted when more information becomes available.

item.title: SSO Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Sep 20, 17:02 PDT
Completed - This maintenance is now complete. Please contact Box Support via https://support.box.com if you experience any issues.

Sep 18, 10:03 PDT
In progress - Our planned maintenance to upgrade our Single Sign On (SSO) cluster is now In Progress. This is expected to complete by September 20th, 2023 at 5:00 PM Pacific Daylight Time. We do not anticipate adverse user impact to SSO logins from this activity. We will also closely monitor the status of the SSO service throughout the maintenance and immediately thereafter.

Any additional updates will continue to be shared through our status site until this maintenance is complete. If you do experience any issues, please contact Box Support via https://support.box.com.

Sep 8, 15:38 PDT
Scheduled - Starting on Monday, September 18th, 2023 Box will perform a third planned maintenance to upgrade our Single Sign On (SSO) cluster. The maintenance will begin at 10:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time and is expected to complete by September 20th, 2023 at 5:00 PM Pacific Daylight Time.

During this maintenance window, the Self-Service SSO Setup, Signing Certificate Manager, and SSO Test Mode/Required toggles in the Box Admin Console will not be available. If you need to implement a change to your SSO connection or certificate during this time, please reach out to our support team via https://support.box.com.

We do not anticipate adverse user impact to SSO logins from this activity, and, to mitigate potential risk, we have built a detailed test and execution plan. We will also closely monitor the status of the SSO service throughout the maintenance and immediately thereafter. Updates on the maintenance as well as any changes in status will be shared through our status site, https://status.box.com.

item.title: [Major] Delay in email notifications
item.content:encoded:
Sep 12, 18:30 PDT
Resolved - From approximately 6:48 PM to 9:40 PM US Pacific Time we had in impact affecting customer email notifications. During this time customers may have experienced delays in receiving email notifications from Box. Our systems automatically detected and corrected the underlying issue. There is no current impact and no further updates will be provided here. If you are currently seeing any issues, please let us know at https://support.box.com.

item.title: SSO Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Sep 8, 15:34 PDT
Completed - This maintenance is now complete. Please contact Box Support via https://support.box.com if you experience any issues.

Sep 6, 10:24 PDT
In progress - Our planned maintenance to upgrade our Single Sign On (SSO) cluster is now In Progress. This is expected to complete by September 8th, 2023 at 5:00 PM Pacific Daylight Time. We do not anticipate adverse user impact to SSO logins from this activity. We will also closely monitor the status of the SSO service throughout the maintenance and immediately thereafter.

Any additional updates will continue to be shared through our status site until this maintenance is complete. If you do experience any issues, please contact Box Support via https://support.box.com.

Aug 22, 13:58 PDT
Scheduled - Starting on Wednesday, September 6th, 2023 Box will perform a second planned maintenance to upgrade our Single Sign On (SSO) cluster. The maintenance will begin at 10:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time and is expected to complete by September 8th, 2023 at 5:00 PM Pacific Daylight Time.

During this maintenance window, the Self-Service SSO Setup, Signing Certificate Manager, and SSO Test Mode/Required toggles in the Box Admin Console will not be available. If you need to implement a change to your SSO connection or certificate during this time, please reach out to our support team via https://support.box.com.

We do not anticipate adverse user impact to SSO logins from this activity, and, to mitigate potential risk, we have built a detailed test and execution plan. We will also closely monitor the status of the SSO service throughout the maintenance and immediately thereafter. Updates on the maintenance as well as any changes in status will be shared through our status site, https://status.box.com.

item.title: FTP Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Sep 8, 12:00 PDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 6, 08:01 PDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 1, 12:30 PDT
Scheduled - Starting on September 6th, Box will perform a planned maintenance to upgrade the Box FTP Server. The maintenance will occur over a three day period from September 6th through September 8th, for three hours each day, beginning at 8:00AM Pacific Daylight Time to 11:00AM Pacific Daylight Time each day.
During this maintenance window, we do not anticipate a degradation of performance or adverse user impact. To mitigate potential risk, we have built a detailed test and execution plan. We will also closely monitor the status of the Box FTP Server throughout the maintenance and immediately thereafter. Updates on the maintenance as well as any changes in status will be shared through our status site, https://status.box.com.
